typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		id as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	query: 'select c.id from c',
	format: 'documentQuery',
	systemColumns: false) ~> sourcecosmosdb
sourcecosmosdb derive(ToLowerID = lower(id)) ~> ToLowerCase
ToLowerCase sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'document',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		id = ToLowerID
	)) ~> DestinationCosmosDB
